title: The Stoner Side of Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Many companies try and get away from the stoner side of cannabis; Scott Sundvor and Space Coyote lean into it. Importance of being focused on profit from the beginning while respecting the plant and consumer. Many great companies have risen from great recessions. 2020 the year of survival. Thoughts on cultivation, natural selection in the cannabis space, getting away from venture dollars and learning the lessons of Covid. Favorite strains and joint rolling tips! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
